inn1.comm: holds its line from back of a length first up, lots of bounce too, Mahela opens up and drops it on to the pitch
fuller and coming in just outside off, Mahela is away with a soft push behind point
well bowled, angled into Dilshan, ending around middle and off, he brings bat down quickly to keep it out
pushed away on the off side
Dilshan has the width to go after, he gives it a thump but the off side infield is packed, cover fields
on to the pads with the angle but he can only tuck it to square leg
checks his forward push and plays out the length ball to mid off
tries to drive the pitched up ball this time, finds mid off again
pushed in front of cover
tidy start so far from Nazmul, Dilshan softly defends a pitched up straightish one around off
but he gives it away off the last ball, overpitched, widish, Dilshan gets front foot out and clobbers it over covers
Mahela decides to charge Mashrafe, does not quite get hold of the pull and earns a single as the ball rolls to the right of midon
nudged on the leg side
pushed on the off side
pitched fuller, just around off stump, he carefully plays it out towards mid off
crack! more width for Dilshan and more punishment for the bowlers, he allows the length ball to come on, stays beside the line and just sends it scurrying past cover with quick hands
angles it in towards the stumps now, Dilshan is not in control as he leans to force it past the non-striker, mid on cuts it off
even more width, and the field cannot even react even as Dilshan stands in the crease, and wallops the back of a length ball through cover
pushed towards cover for a quick single
defended towards covers
Mahela leaves his crease again, looking to scythe this one through cover, but ends up hitting it to point
slowish delivery outside off, guided to point

he's bowled 'em, what a strike early on for Bangladesh, Mahela is gone with a nothing stroke, length delivery outside off stump, angled in a shade, Mahela leaves a big gap between bat and pad as he ends up wafting tentatively across the line, the ball sneaks through and takes out off
pushed on the leg side
worked in front of square leg for one
a punch from the crease is fielded by point running in
bat beside pad as he pushes forward to softly defend a length ball around off
slowish and bounces on Sanga, he is already well forward and adjusts to keep it down
nice line going across Sanga just outside off, he lets it go
allows the back of a length ball to come on and works it from around off in front of midwicket
on the front foot and pushes safely to short extra cover

well played, he gets back and across, wasn't quite to the line of one going across, delayed his stroke, and pushed with an open face between cover and point, you would not think it was just a push with the way the ball speeded across, Nasir cannot stop it cleanly with a slide and concedes a third run
tight single with a nudge through square leg
watches closely as this one goes across him and leaves it alone
reaches across and drives on the front foot but straight to the man at point
swivels eagerly for the pull but cannot get much on it, earns a single towards square leg
excellent line, drew Sanga forward and had him pushing at the original line of one that moved away after pitching on a length, beaten
leading edge rolls towards extra cover, Dilshan has to get back as the throw comes in
this time Sanga wants the single with a push towards extra cover, Dilshan sends him back
they get a tight single finally, Sanga tucks in front of square and they set off, slight hesitation as they stop in the middle, then make it safely in the end
runs it to point with an open face
slapped towards extra cover, a misfield allows him the second run as the fielder cannot stop the ball with one hand

oh dear, Sanga has smacked a pitched up delivery straight to extra cover, nothing much in the delivery, it was widish and slanted across Sanga, who got forward and thumped it straight to the fielder, Bangladesh celebrate with glee, Sanga walks off quickly
skiddy pitched up delivery on middle and leg, turned through midwicket
the two wickets have made even Dilshan a tad cautious, he sees some width and does not go after it like he usually does, punches to extra cover
worked wristily to deep square
coming in a tad from a good length, bit of an inside edge to fine leg
huge shout for leg before, umpire Davis shakes his head, replays show a big inside edge on to pad as Kapu pushes outside the line of one that nips back in
played out very carefully to point
straightish one way outside off stump, but he refuses to go after it
goes for the yorker, not quite full enough, dug out towards extra cover
played out to mid on
tries to hammer a pitched up wide delivery through the off side, but ends up mishitting it to mid on, wonder if he was the right choice to come in at No 4, looking tentative
coming in from back of a length, punched away to extra cover

oh boy, Nazmul is all over the Sri Lankans, this time Dilshan has played on, he had become a touch wary after those two big wickets, but that is just not his game, this time he tries to force a length ball through the off side, with no foot movement, the ball was not wide enough, and he ends up getting an inside edge on to the stumps, some start for Bangladesh
opens up and keeps a back of a length ball down on the pitch
moves well forward and smothers a pitched up ball safely
chopped to point
consecutive maidens, close to off stump and getting bounce from back of a length, played out towards point
another tight delivery, defended off the front foot towards cover
worked with the angle off the pads behind square
ending on the off stump line, defended solidly down the pitch
now one headed for middle, blocked off the front foot
back of a length ball punched to the man at cover
tries to squeeze this one past point but runs it straight to him, cannot get the run
played out towards point
coming in a tad from a good length, he bends forward and blocks, Bangladesh not giving anything away
nothing to be done with this one outside off apart from a block
he decides to walk down the pitch now, but has to defend again, as Nazmul shortens the length
a single after ages, as he runs this length ball to third man
Thirimanne is away finally with a confident straight push past the non-striker to a pitched up ball, mid off gets around to it
starts off short, starts off wide, but sweeper cover will keep this cut shot to one
shot! gets on to the front foot and drives a full one through cover, but there is a sweeper in place
he gets across and brings bat around pad to work from outside off through square leg, quite competently done in the end
some away movement and lots of bounce outside off, left alone
coming in this time from short of a length, he stays back and guides it towards point
now they get two, the second due to some slow work from the third man fielder, Kapu stays beside the line and steers wide of that man
defended down the track
tossed up outside off, played out on the off side softly
fired full towards the pads, worked to deep midwicket
full on middle and off, played back to the bowler
coming in with the angle, just outside off, he had shaped up for the cut, and adjusted to play it to point
half a shout for leg before as this flat delivery is angled in, he takes it on the pad as he presses forward, seemed to be going down leg
a steer wide of third man earns them an easy couple
amid all the wickets and the tight bowling, Thirimanne finds a welcome four, full delivery, he pushes it with a very straight bat and it races past the bowler, mid on and mid off give up
digs out a full delivery on to the off side
shuffles across and drops a bouncing shortish one to point
reaches out and drives a widish one hard, but point saves four as he quickly goes low to his left
slower one on the stumps, he is already forward but adjusts to work to deep square
pushed back  to the bowler
played to midwicket with the spin off the pad
some flight, draws him out, he drives it past the non-striker to long on
comes out of the crease but can only push this length ball away off bat and pad
pushed back to the bowler
driven off the front foot to sweeper cover
straightening on middle, pushed to extra cover
he charges out and has a go, not quite in control but manages to loft it over midwicket
angled down the leg side
flight outside off, he mistimes the drive but picks up one wide of point
well bowled, tossed up slower through the air, he ends up getting beaten as he pushes inside the line
worked to square leg
there was width as this flat delivery hurried across him, but the cut found point
cut straight to point once again, direct hit at the non-striker's end, but the batsman is in
this time, Shakib at point cannot stop this guide, and a run is conceded
falls short of midwicket, it was driven in the air with the spin
tossed up full delivery squeezed past point with an open face
tries to whack this tossed up delivery but mistimes it completely, it rolls back to the bowler
a cleaner pick up from Nazmul at mid on might have tested them as they went for a tight single
goes for the sweep and manages to get it wide of short fine leg, the shot is timed well enough to beat deep square leg running across
pushed back to the bowler
cannot put this wide one away, backs away and hammers it straight to cover, that should have gone
some turn from off, he runs it softly in front of short third man
down the track and an easy single down to long on with a push
fine stop from extra cover, saves some runs with a dive to his left, the drive had been timed well off the front foot
whips a flat one but only as far as square leg
another flat one, this time around off, pushed back to the bowler
worked to midwicket with the spin, he denies them the run with a dive to his right
that will go, widish and flat outside off, thirimanne eases back and cuts in the air, but wide of short third man
pushes forward, opens the face and runs it to short third man
pulled straight to deep square leg
tossed up delivery worked with the spin to midwicket
this shot is on against the offspinner, advances down the pitch and lifts him from outside off over midwicket
goes back in the crease to nudge behind square
pushes a full delivery awkwardly on the off side
squeezes a length ball hurrying on off to short third man
in the air but well short of short extra cover, Thirimanne pushes tentatively
nudged behind square leg
pushed back to the bowler
tossed up ball driven to the bowler who gets a hand to it and parries it to midwicket
goes down and scoops in the air wide of fine leg
flicked to deep midwicket off the pad
gets forward and defends solidly
punched to sweeper cover
shortish offbreak, pulled away to deep midwicket
flat one cut to point
quickish delivery punched to long on
defends a tossed up offbreak off the front foot
dabs a fuller delivery straight to short third man
leaves the crease and brings up the 50th run of the stand with a drive to long on
gets forward and pushes to extra cover
another push to a tossed up ball, to cover
digs out a very full one down the pitch
bends the knee and swings, the ball goes on the bounce to deep square leg
full outside off, pushed wide of point
whipped off the pad, midwicket runs to his left and dives to save the run
spinning away but shortish, and slapped away to sweeper cover
well bowled, carries on away from the batsman after pitching on a length, he misses with the cut
full now, eased back to the bowler
played out to midwicket
punched down to long on
worked towards square leg
flat and shortish, but the cut is stopped by point
full and down the leg side as he misses the nudge
again point goes leaping, this time to his right, and takes pace off the cut, Shakib applauds the effort from Mahmudullah
cut away to sweeper cover
pushes a tossed up delivery to extra cover
swept from outside off, in the air, but on the bounce to deep square
whipped in front of square leg
steered to short third man and the non-striker does well to race to the other end, beats the throw comfortably
punched from the crease to cover
drive falls short of short extra cover
quickish delivery punched to long on
is met with a heave first ball, but the shot is mistimed to mid on
hangs his bat out to one going across and runs it to third man
slower one tucked square off the pad
more brilliant fielding from Bangladesh, the short ball had been guided neatly to his right, but Nasir tumbled to his right at backward point to take the pace off it
whoa, that came back in a mile from a length and pinged him on the glove, he had no time to get into position to play it
slower one guided behind point
on leg to start off, nudged to short fine
punched to extra cover
pushed towards point
on leg stump again, dropped square for a single
punched with the turn to long on
punched from middle wide of point
bowls it a touch short and he slaps it to deep point
stays back and punches it towards long-on and they take the first run quickly
slower ball turns into a full toss as Thirimanne punches it past the bowler, mid-off slides and misfields
another slower ball becomes a full toss, a low one outside off which he drives to sweeper cover
flashes at one outside the off stump and he gets an outside edge to third man
nearly gets another wicket, tucks him up for room as he tries to cut and misses, seemed a bit slower
short of a length on the body and he clips it straight to midwicket
hits the deck hard and he tries to flay that past the keeper but misses, good bounce
uses his feet  to make room and advance down the track but he;s beaten again for pace
misdirects the short ball down the leg side and he swivels and pulls him down to fine leg, beats the fielder, boundary after ten overs
punches it to the off side
short and he mistimes the pull, fine leg collects
worked from outside off behind square with a shuffle across the stumps
punched wide of point
taken from off and turned to deep square
makes room and punches, they advance for the single, but a big dive from extra cover makes them stop, he could not stop it cleanly though
they take on the throw from deep midwicket with a second run, and Thirimanne makes it back as Rahim takes the bails off

unfortunate, how unfortunate is that for Thirimanne, he has been stumped off Rahim's pads, he missed the nudge as this one went down the leg side, it all happened so quickly that Rahim was in no position to collect the ball, it rolled onto the stumps off his pad with Thirimanne's momentum having taken him outside the crease, Bangladesh breaking through before the batting Powerplay
reaches out and squeezes a very wide and full one towards point, throw misses at the non-striker's
somehow he keeps this rising back of a length ball down
drive off a low full toss stopped by a leaping point
poor line, way down the pads, and a tickle is all that is needed to beat the keeper's dive
on target this time with a length  ball, dead-batted to mid off
shortish now, pulled away for one to deep midwicket
quick work from Rahim, he had the bails off in a flash as Tharanga was beaten on the forward push, they check with the third umpire but Tharanga had his back foot in the crease all the time
tossed up ball forced back to the bowler
pushed wide of cover for one
a push with the spin to extra cover
width from back of a length but the punch finds extra cover again, who misfields to concede the run
makes room to a shortish one turning in and slaps it past point
pitched up delivery driven to extra cover
sprayed well down leg from a good length
Tharanga picks up four through his favourite area, gets some width outside off stump, bends the back leg and times it past point, pure timing, third man did not move
another four, through midwicket now, Shahadat is leaking runs, short and sitting up, he pulls it from outside off and gets it through midwicket
more runs, Tharanga back away now and slices to third man
oh dear, Shahadat is clearly having an off day, he sprays another one way down the leg side with some inswing, Rahim does well to stop it with a dive
short-arm pull to the short delivery, to deep midwicket
ends with a decent delivery on middle and off which is blocked
flat delivery worked wide of midwicket
fuller one defended on to the leg side
whipped to deep midwicket
backs away outside leg, Shakib follows him, worked through midwicket
flat delivery, he backs away and cuts hard, straight to point
excellent over from Shakib, Tharanga forces a full delivery to him on the bounce
comes down the track, but misses the straightish length ball as he looks to go over mid off
worked straight to midwicket
tries to swing this one with the angle over square leg, cannot get hold of well enough
pitching outside leg stump, strikes him on the pad off an inside edge
slower one now, Mashrafe has been superb today, off cutter is pushed back to him
comes down the track and works from outside off to deep square leg
pushed off the front foot towards cover, Rahim goes charging towards the ball
worked in front of square leg
whipped across the line to deep midwicket, quick work in keeping them to one
length ball worked to deep midwicket
nudged through vacant midwicket, that will be a hard-fought fifty for Kapu, Shakib in pursuit of the ball
short, too short, sitting up, and he backs away to dispatch if past extra cover
back of a length ball on leg, nudged to short fine
this is what he has been looking to do, makes some room and lifts the length ball over extra cover, it is pulled back just inside the rope
hit on the pads as he walks down the pitch, big appeal for lbw, umpire Davis shakes his head, replays show it would have just about clipped leg, cannot give those
slowish and full, flicked to midwicket on the edge of the circle
backs away outside leg and reaches out to flat-bat this one past the bowler, mid off does well to get across and stop it with a dive
slower one nudged through midwicket
turned straight to short fine with the turn
down the track and drives to long on, Sri Lanka not going anywhere in the Powerplay
backs away and drills a yorker-length delivery to cover
succeeds this time as he makes room outside leg, lofts the tossed up ball from middle over extra cover
sharp catch from Shakib, Kapu cannot believe it, he had smashed this full delivery inside-out but it carried low to Shakib at extra cover, the former captain goes low to hold on
hit on the pads, Rahim shouts, Razzak doesn't, it was skidding down leg
tossed up ball worked from middle to square leg
flighted ball goes down the leg side, tharanga misses with the sweep
makes room and times the guide wide of short third man
the line was taking it down leg, he got some glove on it as he went down for the sweep, rolls fine past the keeper
beats him on the drive with a tossed up ball that goes across with the angle
pushes a full ball to long off
Shakib strikes, Maharoof going for the cut to a tossed up ball that straightened and skidded, gets an edge through to Rahim
punched to mid on
does not get hold of the shot but manages to run the sweep to short fine leg with the spin
length ball dropped straight to midwicket
flighted ball slides down leg
again on the pads, nudged to short fine leg
fired miles down leg, really poor delivery
that will go into the boundary, a dive from sweeper cover cannot prevent the four, Tharanga gets some width and few batsmen time the ball through point better than him
pushed back to the bowler
defends a generously flighted ball to the bowler

slow left-arm strikes once more, Kula given leg-before as he pushes forward, could there have been an inside edge, if there wasn't he was gone, Shakib getting the flat delivery to skid on, replays show it would have struck middle
defended off the front foot on to the off side
inside edge saves him as the tossed up ball rolls on the leg side
presses forward in defence
full delivery worked straight to midwicket, wicket maiden from Shakib, priceless
and immediately the first ball flies off the bat, Tharanga gets forward and thumps the drive to a wide and full delivery, extra cover stops it
nudges a length ball with the angle to midwicket
whipped in the air to deep midwicket
width outside off, he reaches out and chops it wide of third man who keeps them to one with a quick run to his left
cannot get hold of the pull as Shahadat bangs in the short ball into the body
cannot get this one away as well, gets forward and pushes, straight to mid off
drives a full delivery wide of sweeper cover to pick up a couple
worked off the pad through square leg
slogs, from outside off, gets it along the ground to deep square
here comes Tharanga, gets to the pitch and clobbers it high over long on
misses the sweep as Shakib sprays it down leg
another poor delivery down the pads, and this time Tharanga takes toll, gets enough on it to send it racing fine down leg past the keeper
keeps strike with a push to long off
runs it straight to backward point
short ball swung behind square leg, would have gone for four past short fine had he connected well
another short ball, pulled to deep square with the angle
important strike, Tharanga goes caught behind, to a full away swinging delivery just outside off, Tharanga bent across, tried to run it away but only managed a thick edge to Rahim
Maliga is greeted by a near-yorker first up, and carefully pats it away on the off side
fine end to a tight over, sharp back of a length ball worked away to midwicket
misses this length ball and they take a run as it rolls away on the off side off thigh pad
works this short of a length ball to square leg for one
that is a very competent stroke, slightly short, he waits for it and swings it calmly over square leg and into the boundary
chops this one from very close to the body towards point
slower one, neatly bowled, Malinga ends up chopping it on the bounce to the keeper
slaps a widish one away to sweeper cover
fullish one heaved down past the non-striker to long on
slow bouncing delivery, he cannot chop it away, edges it on the bounce to Rahim
well played, takes the full delivery off the pads and lifts it powerfully over midwicket
cannot connect with the cut to this wide and slow delivery
worked with the angle behind square leg for two
more runs off Shahadat, wide and full outside off, he has a go at it and ends up slicing it over cover, sweeper cannot cut it off
four more, Malinga advances down the track, gets some bat on it to get it past the keeper, no chance for RAhim
has another heave and cannot get it away this time
and again, wants to hammer it down the ground but cannot connect
slogged wide of long on who runs across, slides and parries it back to deep midwicket
in the blockhole as he makes room outside leg for a big swing, misses again
he's had all sorts of heaves and swings this over but hardly connected, leaves the crease, but can manage only an inside edge to short fine
Mashrafe has been outstanding today, fools Malinga with a slower length ball, he ends up having a slog all around it, off stump is rattled
length ball rolls off the pads behind square leg
bends his knee and tries to fetch this one from outside off, misses
lovely work from Mashrafe, has him digging back a very full delivery, then dives full-length forward to take the ball, hits the ground hard
pull falls short of deep square leg, who lets rid of the ball quickly with a sharp throw to the keeper, Rahim has the bails off before a diving Lakmal can get in

inn2.comm: swinging in full for the off stump, Tamim gets forward and pushes to mid off
this time it ends up as a low full toss as it swerves into towards the pads, tucked fine but not wide enough of fine leg
phew, 144.3 kph yorker screams in for the stumps, Nazimuddin somehow manages to get his bat down, just in time, and squeezes it out to third man
sharp single, comes forward and across and nudges the length ball in front of midwicket
shot! superbly done, Malinga straying full onto middle and leg, Nazimuddin could not be bothered as he flicks elegantly between midwicket and mid on
the ball goes flying across the outfield to fine leg as he shuffles and powerfully whips this one with the angle
defends a length ball that comes back in
tries to force a similar delivery down the ground, mishits it to the bowler
he has been in the same area for all the three deliveries, another one moves in just outside off, bounces too, beats Nazimuddin who tries to slap it through the off side

he was not looking comfortable with the one coming in, and it has got him on the fourth attempt, Kula gets it to jag back in from a good length, Nazimuddin still wants to force it through the off side, ends up playing a loose stroke from the crease, and inside-edges onto the stumps
slightly widish as it comes back in again, cut away to third man
moves forward and pushes towards cover, immediately sends back  the advancing non-striker
thick outside edge towards point as he defends a sharp back of a length ball
pushed off the front foot to mid off
sends the slower one well down the leg side

huge appeal for a catch, Sri Lanka are totally convinced, umpire Reiffel is not, he was in no position to tackle the short ball as it reared up at his head, tried to swat it away awkwardly with a bent knee, before that could happen, it had pinged him on the helmet, and popped up to cover, did not seem to be any bat involved
follows it up with a slow and full one, which goes down leg
alternating between the bouncer and the slower one, Jahurul gets out of the line of this nasty one
another bouncer, well avoided, Jahurul bends his knee, goes low, drops his wrists and allows it go over

that's got to be close, this is fast, furious and testing stuff, a length ball now, comes in and raps him on the pad, appeal for lbw turned down, would have clipped the top of middle, as replays show, too much doubt with the height
superb delivery, there is lots of movement for Kula, Tamim tries to follow this one zipping across him, and is beaten
tickled fine past the keeper, poor line on the pads
supreme drive from Tamim, he got forward so soon and walloped this length ball, extra cover cuts off the four
so he goes over extra cover now, delays his stroke for an instant to get the elevation, Kula going widish outside off
Kula gets it right this time, starts it on leg, Tamim wants to clip it through midwicket, but the ball swerves away to take the leading edge behind point
length ball nipping in to the right-hander, defended
incredible striking from Tamim, wide from Malinga, he gets front foot across and clatters it past point with a dismissive swing of the bat
takes a single in front of mid on with a push off a length ball
inside edge on to pad as he tentatively pushes at one outside off
the bouncer arrives, on target into Jahurul, who wants to hook, but is beaten
low full toss now, pushed back to the bowler, Malinga smiles
better from Jahurul, he has been tested by Malinga a lot, gets a wide and full delivery, throws his bat at it as he goes for the drive, mistimed to extra cover
more aggression from Tamim, he has the crowd roaring its approval, picks up this length ball going across him and lofts it cleanly over the non-striker
pushed towards point
worked off the pads wide of fine leg
widish one cut away to third man
another boundary, Tamim gets another one on leg stump, and leans across to tuck it past a diving midwicket
once more, Kula sends in another one towards Tamim's pads, this time he goes squarer with his tuck, giving midwicket no chance at all
fullish one worked to midwicket
and Jahurul has thrown it away, with Tamim in such supreme touch at the other end, saw Lakmal pitching it short, went for the pull belatedly, and ended up spooning it to squarish midwicket
gets across to a back of a length ball and defends
worked away to midwicket
a cleaner pick-up from midwicket would have tested Rahim as he set off after tucking this one in that region, Kapu could not pick up the ball with a dive, though
gets on his toes and defends a rising back of a length ball
massive strike, Kula has bowled Rahim, superb delivery, fullish enough to make him go for the off-drive, and swings in late to go past the bat and hit off
looks to leave one moving away from him, it hits the outer part of the bat and rolls towards slips
turned behind square leg
loose, he goes for a drive to a widish one going across him, beaten
length ball pushed to Malinga at mid on
punched to extra cover, Tamim takes a start, Shakib follows him, Tamim stops as he sees the fielder has got to the ball, Shakib makes it back just in time
chops a straightening back of a length ball to third man
nudged off the pads fine down leg, Sanga goes after it
short ball just outside off, he goes for the pull, edge flies just over Sanga
they continue to go for their shots, Shakib goes for the lofted drive off the front foot, not in control at all as he manages to get it over cover
comes back in sharply, he is caught on the crease and inside-edges behind square leg
goes for the punch to this slowish length ball, mistimed to point
worked through square leg off the pad for an easy couple
opens up and defends a length ball on middle and off
they keep going after the bowling, a charge down the track and a flail to a widish one, thick edge flies to third man
withdraws out of the line of a short ball dug in really short outside off
driven off the front foot to mid on
uses the changed angle to tuck the length ball to deep square
stays beside the line and plays his typical stroke, a quick-wristed slap to point
they have provided lots of width outside off, the Sri Lankans, he stays in the crease, and punches past point
punched off the back foot to short extra cover
reaches forward and across and pushes to point, a needless shy from the fielder hits the non-striker's stumps, Shakib was comfortably in his crease, an overthrow conceded
thwack! another boundary, Bangladesh are not going to change their approach, Shakib gets across to the line of this pitched up delivery and belts it with a big followthrough past a diving cover
it makes no difference, Shakib goes wide of the deep fielder now, again he gets forward confidently, drives through extra cover this time, just beats the man running across near the rope

third four on the trot, they might win some, they might lose more, but are they entertaining to watch when in flow, now Shakib goes through point with a whiplash cut, third man runs hard to his left, dives, but the ball rolls into the rope
defended off the front foot
nudged towards square leg from middle and leg
he opens the face and runs this one from off to point with sharp wristwork
looks to cut from close to off, finds point
gets forward and pushes to short extra cover
tossed up, dips on him around off, he mistimes the drive
defended down the track
driven off the front foot to mid off, decides not to go for the single after taking some steps out of the crease, rightly so
driven hard to sweeper cover
defended towards cover, Tamim sends Shakib back as the fielder gets to the ball
misses as he looks to steer to third man
mistimes the forcing drive to mid off
don';t ask how that missed! Straightened and sneaked past the pad and bat and off stump
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
collision! He pushes it to the off side and scamper a single, Tamim collides with the bowler, the throw was wide
goes for the hoick and gets an outside edge that just about swirls over the keeper and slip and Maharoof manages to slide and pull it back at third man
gets forward and pushes it to the on side
and is met with a quick cut that races past point, third man is squarish and cuts it off
cannot swing the shortish ball off the pads, it rolls away on the off side
this will be close, Maharoof has got to the ball on the leg side and found the sutmps, Shakib dropped the ball and went for the run, Tamim has just managed to sneak his bat in at full stretch
he charges out and tries to slog Maharoof out of sight, chops it into the pitch
safely worked away to deep midwicket
another one worked to midwicket
chops the cut from very close to off stump, gets it past short third man who gives chase and pulls it back
bat in front of pad as he smothers a tossed up ball
here comes Tamim, he is not quite close to the pitch, but adjusts to swing it over midwicket
allows the tossed up ball to come on and punches it to sweeper cover off the front foot
goes back and across and takes one with a nudge towards square leg, 50-run stand is up, they are right back into this
smack! finds sweeper cover with a forcing cut as he backs away

bat gets down just in time in front of pad as he drives through midwicket, Maharoof holds his head as he knows how close that was, but the stroke has been timed so well that it beats midwicket's dive and runs into the boundary
Dilshan gets his hand to a screaming cut as he dives to his left, it rolls away to sweeper cover
this is frenetic, this is absorbing, a forcing punch goes through the infield wide of sweeper cover

another one, confidence oozing in Tamim Iqbal's drive as he sends the full delivery racing through the non-striker's legs with a big followthrough, mid off has no chance, that is also 50 for Tamim, to think that he was left out of the original squad for the tournament
pushed towards cover
pushed to mid off for one
Tamim has been dropped, Senanayake has put down a sitter, he drove well away from his body as this flighted ball dipped on him, it was at a decent height close to Senanayake's left, but popped out
defended off the front foot safely this time
nudged towards midwicket off the pad
makes room and slaps this shortish one to sweeper cover

forcefully punched wide of sweeper cover, 'keeper, keeper' is the shout for the throw from Sanga, which is at the non-striker's end unfortunately for Sri Lanka, Tamim was struggling a shade to make his ground
driven back to the bowler, what a miss that could prove to be, for India
slower one cutting across the left-hander on a length, he does well to open the face and run it fine wide of third man
short-arm jab to a shortish delivery in front of square leg
emphatic, dismissive, the pull shot is on to the short ball, it is picked over midwicket with authority
lovely to watch, he arches back as the shortish one bounces on him and guides it crisply to third man
too much on the pads, tucked fine, Malinga has to run across a long way from fine leg
stands tall and drives hard but straight to mid off
appeal for leg before as he misses the tossed up full ball, looked close
he is gone this time, big wicket, Tamim has cut this shortish ball in the air and point has held on to a sharp catch, tumbling low to his right, still a long way to go for Bangladesh
punched down to long on with the spin
inside edge pops up towards midwicket as he pushes forward
full delivery pushed hard back to the bowler
runs a length ball to third man
reaches out and pushes a straightish length ball to extra cover
the slower and full delivery, he ends up working it in the air, but midwicket is vacant
hangs in the crease to a length ball and crashes it to sweeper cover
bouncer now to the new batsman who goes down under it
again the slow and full delivery, he reaches forward and eases it to mid on
that was close, that would have been a dolly for cover, Shakib making room and almost spooning up this turning delivery, falls short
and another one, closer this time, gets a leading edge as he tries to work on the leg side, bowler dives forward but the ball falls just short
defended safely off the front foot now
he backs away, and takes the ball off the stumps, connects superbly with the cut and it races past backward point
appeal for lbw, Shakib staying in the crease to a length ball that came in, that was going down leg though
what an over, he could have been gone twice, but he gets to his fifty, moves down the track and lofts inside out over extra cover, totally in control of the shot
goes for the drive to a pitched up ball but mistimes it
he was late to pick up this bouncer but got out of the way calmly in time
nothing calm this time as he tries to swat a short ball that rears up at him, loops it up towards vacant square leg
full delivery driven hard into the pitch and over the bowler's head for a single
he had no clue this time about the bouncer, ducked right into it, ball popped up off the glove but fell short of point
another bouncer, but this time he is prepared and gets head out of the way
he takes on the offspinner once again, skips out, and lofts it with the turn over extra cover, he took that from around leg stump

that is close, that is plumb, Shakib is gone, tosses it up, gets it to drift in, lands on middle, does not turn away, skids in with the angle, Shakib is caught on the crease and caught plumb in front, that was taking out leg
defended off the front foot
nudged square on the leg side
forced back to the bowler from the crease
width for the cut, but he finds cover as he makes room and has a go at it
gets beside the line and pushes it to the off side
has him duckling under the bouncer
swings it in, he clips it away very close to his pads and works it down to fine leg
bangs it in really short and he ducks under that, he leaves it alone and wide called
fullish on the stumps and clipped away down to mid-on
squeezes out a full delivery back to the bowler
makes a bit of room and punches it wide of diving short cover, Senanayake does well to slide at the deep cover boundary and save a four
turned to midwicket with the spin
works a full ball to midwicket
nudged fine down the leg side, work for Malinga as he runs across from deep square
length ball punched from the crease to midwicket
goes for the pull, does not time it at all, deep midwicket fields
defended softly off the front foot, that is the end of Senanayake's quota for the match
reaches out and drives along the ground to sweeper cover
punched to point from the crease
bends forward and defends on to the off side
misses the cut off the slower one, goes on the bounce to the keeper
well played, swivels and pulls the short ball in the air over midwicket
that is a quite needless shot, he made a lot of room to a pitched up ball and ended up slicing it high to sweeper cover, but it falls just short of Malinga running to his right
moves across and defends a length ball down the track
another shot in the air, another one falling short, he arches back and makes room as he pulls, on the bounce to deep square
low full toss on the pads, put away easily fine past the keeper
sprays it wide down the leg side now
line going wrong again for Lakmal, batsman moves across and tucks off the pads to fine leg
sensibly dabs a slower one down to third man
oh dear, this is really poor stuff from Lakmal, he sends another length ball on to the pads, and is taken for four fine down leg
"almost delicious" shot, says Ramiz Raja on air, Nasir bends his back leg, pushes at a length ball and squeezes it in the air to the left of third man
played out towards point
more stuff on the pads, he gets outside the line and tucks it to fine leg
keeps a back of a length ball down close to the pitch on the leg side
bends forward and smothers a pitched up ball
straightens outside off stump, met with a calm and resolute block
all of a sudden, the preferred length seems to be down the leg side, Kula gets it to move in but it was ending up on the pads, and it put away past a diving Sanga
stays in the crease and pushes to point
plays out a length ball to extra cover
played out without intent of scoring to covers, they can afford these quiet deliveries
nothing working for Sri Lanka, Nasir gets a top edge off an attempted pull that flies over Sanga, Kula has hands on his hips
comes back in and is played out on the leg side
stays in the crease and dabs a slow and full one to third man
keeps a short ball down on the off side, wants the single but is sent back
attempted yorker screams full down the leg side, a tickle would have earned four, Nasir could not get anything on it
reaches out, hops and stabs a wide and rising delivery in the air down to third man
nudges a rearing back of a length ball behind square leg
yorker, almost got him, he jams down his bat on it, it rolls on to thigh pad, and almost on to the stumps
eases a pitched up ball down to mid off, one over negotiated, Malinga has two more overs left
Dilshan shouts for leg before, the ball landed well outside leg stump, and would have gone down leg as well
lunges for the sweep, and belts it through square leg, past the man in the deep, four more, they get closer
paddles it just past Sanga
cannot work it away and it rolls on the leg side
runs it straight to short third man, not getting the run
would have been a wide had he not nudged it to short fine
pushes it wide of point to bring up the 50 of the partnership
cut away into the ground, over point, almost runs into the rope, sweeper cover scrambles across, manages to pull it back
swung behind square leg, they even come back for the second, the crowd roars with glee
pushes a very full one from the stumps to mid on, Mahela looks out of ideas
reaches forward and pushes the slower one down to long off for an easy single
another four, Bangladesh doing it coolly, shortish ball, Mahmudullah swivels, and pulls through square leg, fine leg was around, it was too quick for him
yorker arrives, on the stumps, dug out safely, even a single squeezed out , Malinga cannot get to the ball in time, Mahela cannot believe it
no need for this from Mahmudullah, he exposes his stumps, stands outside leg, and misses the full delivery just outside off
goes for the yorker again, not exactly in the blockhole, he shuffles and turns it to deep square
fullish outside off, he reaches out to push firmly down to mid off
low full toss swinging in, calmly kept out to midwicket
slow and full, just outside off, dug out on the leg side
he really had a crack at that pull as he arched back, straight to deep midwicket though
close call for Nasir, he is sent back after dabbing a slow one towards backward point, Dilshan lets the throw rip, it misses
yorker arrives just on off, Nasir digs it out to point
pushed off the front foot to mid off
wide called, the short ball gets up, it gets up too much
drives a near-yorker back to the bowler, nothing happening for Sri Lanka, India's hopes nearly gone, Bangladesh wait eagerly
they keep going for yorker after yorker and Bangladesh continue to deny them, another very full one pushed hard to mid off
nudged wide of short fine leg
forced back to the bowler from the crease
tucked through square leg for a single
he took it from middle and leg, made room and slapped it to sweeper cover
easy work off the pad to deep square
two more, worked in front of square leg, they come back  by the time deep midwicket gets across
appeal for lbw as the yorker zooms in towards the legs, rolls towards fine leg, it took the bat, as replays show
bends forward to a low full toss, inside edges it to midwicket
full delivery, driven to extra cover
very low full toss tucked off the pad to fine leg
inside edges a yorker to Sanga's left, the keeper does superbly to collect it
full toss played out to mid on for a single
that will be it, Bangladesh are through to the final of the Asia Cup, mid on's dive cannot prevent the drive from rushing towards the straight boundary
